item.description:
This is a hike that our single members might enjoy. Charlie's Active Singles hikes are for active single people in their 30's through 50's and average up to 200 people per event! These events have been found to be fun and well planned!

Meet-up is at 8 AM at location of the hike. Hikers are usually split up into 3 different hiking skill levels (something like advanced, novice, and social) and the difficulty of the hike corresponds. The hike starts at 8:30 AM and usually lasts about 2 hours. Afterwards, dinner facilities are arranged for refueling and socializing. ;-)

DIRECTIONS (a bit sketchy but best I have -Contact Charlie for clearer directions):
* From western Conn, take Rt8 North to exit 39.
* End of ramp turn right onto Rt6.
* Continue on Rt6 into Bristol then look for the stop light at the intersection on Rt6 & Rt69( North Side Square Plaza will be on the right just past the intersection ).
* Turn left ( North ) onto Rt69 ( N. Main St ).
** Follow N. Main up the hill till the road comes to an intersection, Turn Right at intersection ( Left is a dead end ).
* Take 1st quick left onto N. Pond Rd.
* Continue a few blocks on N. Pond Rd then turn left onto Beach St.
* Park is one block down on the right.

* From Eastern Conn Take I84 till exit 39 ( Rt6 )
* Follow Rt6 west into Bristol then look for the intersection of Rt6 & Rt69 ( North Side Square Plaza will be left ) at light turn right on Rt69 North ( N. Main St )
* Follow directions from above(**).




Active Singles is a 10 year old, non-profit Connecticut organization that brings together singles who enjoy participating in a variety of outdoor activities.

CONTACT: Charlie (organizer of Active Singles) 860-489-9611

No official Hartford Area Hiking leadership is planned to be at this hike. Just mingle with the other Active Singles (you're one!).

NO Children or Dogs, Singles only (this doesn't mean you can't have a boyfriend or girlfriend). Wear Hiking Boots. Bring water. Optional Brunch follows each hike. Non hikers can join us at the restaurant. Call Charlie early to reserve a spot for Brunch.

Active Singles
http://www.activesing...

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.

item.name: Active Singles Hike to Hoppers Birge Pond in Bristol CT
